description:
Description
Exfoliating Wash-off Body Spray: Spray onto your targeted body areas including back, chest, legs and arms, gently massage and rinse with lukewarm water after 1 minute. Helps to smooth out and resurface rough, bumpy body skin.32% AHA+BHA+PHA+LHA & Succinic Acid: The formula is designed to be delivered to the skin to dissolve deeply into thick body skin. effectively targeting stubborn skin issues and uneven texture.Bloody Powerful Self-peeling Body Care: Crafted for easy home use, this striking deep-red spray is designed to extract imperfections from within, like a vampire.Encapsulated in fine particles, these potent ingredients combat the four main causes of body imperfections: Sebum, Oil, Dead Skin, and Trouble-causing Source.How To Use: Apply to dry skin. Spray onto your targeted body areas such as the back, chest, shoulders, and buttocks before showering. Leave on for 1 minute, then rinse off.

description:
Description

- These multi-tasking pads with PHA and botanical ingredients offer an excellent solution to tone and soothe armpits.
- Featuring skin-brightening ingredients such as extracts of White Truffle, Green Tea and Niacinamide.


Suggested Use

1. Wipe over the underarm area, knees and elbow with the pads to gently buff away unwanted debris. 

2. Pat lightly to aid better absorption. 
Full Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Chlorphenesin, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Panthenol, Tuber Magnatum Extract, Gluconolactone, Arginine, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Biota Orientalis Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Oil, Resveratrol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glutathione, Limonene, Linalool.

reviews.content: I’m not sure if it’s the best option out there. I finished the entire bottle and only noticed a slight improvement. Maybe with consistent use over 1 to 2 Jars , the results would be more noticeable, but for now, the difference was pretty minimal for me.
